document.full_text: u.s. retailers warned of rising costs and cautious consumers even as a late easter boosted sales of clothing and other holiday-related items in april, helping many beat sales expectations.
document.title: retailers warn on costs as sales beat
lines_and_colors: u.s. retailers warned of rising costs and cautious consumers even as a late easter boosted sales of clothing and other holiday-related items in april, helping many beat sales expectations.
